hints.content:
A nature center has $\purpleD{13}$ monkeys. $\blueE5$ monkeys are on the low tree branches.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/dc5b8833111493eec310d6e9b0b070a41edb089f)

$\purpleD{13}-\blueE{5}=\maroonD{8}$

There were $\maroonD{8}$ monkey's left.

$\tealE{1}$ monkey was swinging on a tire swing.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/de09d4fd4ec14b57ee70f08adda3c04048c4de56)

$\maroonD{8}-\tealE{1}=\goldE{7}$
There are $\goldE{7}$ monkeys in the leafy treetop.

question.content:
A nature center has $13$ monkeys playing in it.  $5$ monkeys are on the low tree branches.  One more monkey is swinging on a tire swing.   The rest of the monkeys are in the leafy treetop. 

**How many monkeys are in the treetop?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] monkeys
